bibdata.title: IEEE Standards for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Supplement to Standard for Interoperable LAN/MAN Security (SILS)
Security Architecture Framework
IEEE Standards for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Supplement to Standard for Interoperable LAN/MAN Security (SILS) - Security Architecture Framework

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: An architectural description of the functions and location of standard for interoperable LAN/MAN security (SILS) components is provided. The SILS components and their relationships to applications, communications protocols, system management, and security management are described.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
